legal_basis: sections 14.01 and 14.02 of the Bankruptcy Act
decision_reasoning: Administrative tribunals may determine constitutional questions if empowered by statute or impliedly through duties.
jurisdictional_issues: panel lacked explicit or implied authority to decide constitutional issues
cause_of_action: Trustees challenged the constitutionality of sections enabling license cancellation proceedings
procedure_followed: Judicial review application after panel dismissed trustees' motion on jurisdictional grounds
result_of_case: Applications for judicial review dismissed; panel had no power to rule on constitutional matters
